title: Forward communications
creator_credit: Bern Gandy and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Stresses that Australia’s vast distances make an efficient system of communication most essential. Shows how the Post Office is maintaining our present communications system at a high level of efficiency and also how the heavy post-war demand for new telephones and exchanges is being met.
